title: Cucumber, Smoked Trout & Horseradish Sandwiches
summary: Cucumber, Smoked Trout & Horseradish Sandwiches might be a good recipe to expand your main course recipe box. This recipe makes 2 servings with 544 calories, 32g of protein, and 28g of fat each. For $5.84 per serving, this recipe covers 25% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. It is brought to you by BBC Good Food. Head to the store and pick up butter, trout, horseradish sauce, and a few other things to make it today. To use up the butter you could follow this main course with the Cinnamon Butter Cake as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 14 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 61%. This score is solid. Smoked Trout & Cucumber Sandwiches, Smoked Trout-and-Horseradish Spread, and Smoked trout & horseradish pâté are very similar to this recipe.
